title: Client bug splat in ranked champ select leads to anger.
body: NO idea why or where this came from but this just happened and I'm very unhappy face.

replies.body:
Yep ran the stupid repair relaunched game and I play an aram to make sure everything is fine.

And it is.

So I go back into ranked and it gets to my turn to select a champ and I encounter another error.

"Client has encountered a critical error" and I get booted back to lobby. Bang another 10 lp lost and a 30 minute ban.

Get on smurf and try doing a draft normal and I get "an unknown error has occurred." and my client shuts down.


Seriously my ping is fine my internet is fine, pinging the NA server nets me a 64ms ping with no packet loss, so I have no clue what's going on.  All I know is that I'm sitting 20 lp short because of a client bug splat that just started today.
i have the same problems but on EU west serveur

Bugsplats occur when a weird interaction happens with either your system drivers or hardware. We've consolidated the most common solutions inside our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd recommend working from there.

Let me know if this helped.
